column10: 'Other Libertarian-Esque Views. I Am A Bitcoin Evangelist']"	"The crypto asset known as Theta was the hottest altcoin in the space during May
column11: but false rumors of a partnership with Google led to a strong selloff.

column1: The downside in the cryptocurrency looks to continue
column2: as two highly accurate sell signals have triggered on weekly timeframes on both the USD and BTC trading pairs.

column1: Theta Pumps Nearly 400% Against the Dollar in May
column2: 350% Against Bitcoin

column1: At the start of May to the peak of the pump
column2: the altcoin known as Theta rallied over 360% against Bitcoin. There was a matching nearly 400% rise on the USD trading pair.

column1: The rally was fueled by false information spreading about a partnership with Google
column2: however
column3: it was later revealed that the partnership was simply Theta relying on Google’s cloud services on the client-side.

column1: While no true partnership exists
column2: the massive surge brought back memories of the crypto hype bubble.

column1: Related Reading | Theta Cryptocurrency Plunges 50% As Traders Question Google Partnership
During that time
column2: it wasn’t uncommon to see altcoins rally hundreds of percent against Bitcoin or the dollar.

column1: While those days are long gone
column2: and money won’t be as easy to come by during the next cycle
column3: Theta’s recent explosion provides much-needed hope that a return to a crypto bull market may soon be coming.

column1: But before any sustained bullish advance or uptrend begins
column2: Theta is due for a stronger correction
column3: according go a duo of highly accurate sell signals across the THETAUSD and THETABTC trading pairs.

column1: USD & BTC Sell Signals Could Cause The Attractive Altcoin To Dump Further
Over the last month
column2: few altcoins were discussed as highly as Theta. The asset quickly became the crypto industry’s hottest token.

column1: But as soon as overly eager investors realized the partnership news was a non-event
column2: a selloff cut the gains back significantly.

column1: More downside is also very likely
column2: given a set of sell setups signaled by the TD Sequential indicator on weekly timeframes.

column1: The TD Sequential indicator is a market-timing tool developed by Thomas Demark. After a specific sequence of candles form
column2: it often is a sign that a reversal or pullback is near.

column1: Related Reading | Venture Capitalist: Crypto Gains Won’t Come As Easy During Next Bull Run
The signal has called many Bitcoin and altcoin tops and bottoms over the last several years
column2: dating back to Bitcoin’s all-time high. It’s proven that its a tool that should never be underestimated.

column1: The 9 sell setup has appeared on both THETAUSD and THETABTC price charts
column2: suggesting that not only is a collapse in USD value expected
column3: but the altcoin will underperform against Bitcoin in the days ahead.

column1: TD 9 sell signals have appeared across most cryptocurrency assets
column2: including Bitcoin
column3: Ethereum
column4: Chainlink
column5: and countless others. The crypto market’s best performer
column7: also sharing this signal doesn’t bode well for the entire asset class.

column1: Crypto as a whole often follows Bitcoin’s lead
column2: and while sentiment and fundamentals have never been more bullish for Bitcoin
column3: the asset is also facing its strongest resistance yet.

column1: Should another crash happen in Bitcoin ahead of a clean breakout from the downtrend
column2: a lower high could cause extreme panic and a selloff will soon follow.

column1: Bitcoin crashing from here would carry the entire crypto market down with it
column2: Theta included."

column1: 2020-06-15 20:00:32+00:00	Ethereum Likely to Dive Towards $200 as Overnight Selloff Rattles Market Structure	['Cole Is A Cryptocurrency Analyst Based In Los Angeles. He Studied At The University Of California Irvine'
column2: 'Has Been Interested In Bitcoin'
column3: 'The Crypto Markets Since']	"Ethereum has decline today alongside Bitcoin and the aggregated crypto market
column4: breaking below a key support level that was previously being defended by buyers

column1: It now appears that ETH could be well positioned to see even further downside in the days and weeks ahead
One technical indicator is forecasting that it will plunge to $200 before it is able to garner any notable buying pressure
This could lead it to break below a key support level
column2: and catalyze a far-reaching downtrend

column1: Prior to yesterday evening
column2: Bitcoin
column3: Ethereum
column4: and the aggregated crypto market had been caught within a consolidation phase that persisted for many weeks.

column1: Although the overnight decline seen by most major cryptocurrencies did cause them to shatter the lower boundaries of these consolidation channels
column2: it is important to note that buyers have still defended several key levels.

column1: In the case of Etheereum
column2: although the crypto was previously flashing some signs of immense strength
column3: its dependence on Bitcoin has made it prone to the weakness seen by the entire crypto market today.

column1: That being said
column2: one technical indicator is now suggesting that it will continue plunging until it reaches $200.

column1: This would force it below a key support level
column2: and potentially kick off a notable downtrend in the weeks ahead.

column1: Ethereum Declines Alongside Entire Crypto Market; Key Support Fast Approaches
At the time of writing
column2: Ethereum is trading down just under 6% at its current price of $222.65. It has been flashing some intense signs of weakness throughout the past 12 hours
column3: as it has also declined by over 2% against its Bitcoin trading pair.

column1: It does appear that this weakness will extend further in the near-term
column2: as this latest decline forced it below $230 – the level that marked the lower boundary of its previous trading range.

column1: One analyst also explained that $215 is an important level for it to maintain above. This happens to be around the point at which it was finding significant resistance throughout most of May – as seen in the below chart.
Here’s Why ETH Could Soon Reel Towards $200
There is one respected technical indicator that suggests Ethereum is poised to post a notable decline in the days and weeks ahead.
Another prominent analyst spoke about this technical indicator in a recent tweet
column2: explaining that it shows ETH is likely to reel towards $200 before finding any notable support
column3: while also showing that Bitcoin could soon hit $8

column1: “BTC and ETH Cloud pretty clear on targets here. 8.5 and 200. Another way to think of this: HH less probable than retrace/mean reversion
column2: ” he explained while pointing to the below chart.

column1: How Ethereum trends in the days ahead should provide valuable insights into just how much technical damage was done by its recent price decline.

column1: ‘Monster Move’ Coming Soon for Bitcoin

column1: Bitcoin Could be a World Reserve Currency Says Financial Author and Tech Visionary Jeff Booth
On June 11
column3: the entrepreneur and best-selling author
column4: Jeff Booth
column5: spoke with Max Keiser of Keiser Report about bitcoin (BTC). Booth seems to think that BTC has a good chance of being a “world reserve currency.” The author tells Keiser that the central banks’ massive creation of money has been a force that is driving bitcoin’s trend toward being a world reserve.

column1: “Those forces
column2: competing against each other
column3: are driving essential asset prices up… People are trying to work harder to keep up with rising asset prices that are created in the first place by the central governments’ trend to stop deflation
column4: ” Booth said. The CEO of e-commerce company Builddirect also added:

column1: I see bitcoin as a likely
column2: a very likely candidate for a world reserve currency. So
column3: I see it has a really good chance of winning over time as it works on a network effect.
